an6.66:4.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.66:4.3: Thinaṃ, middhaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, kukkuccaṃ, assaddhiyaṃ, pamādaṃ—
an6.66:4.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.66:5.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.66:5.3: Thinaṃ, middhaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, kukkuccaṃ, assaddhiyaṃ, pamādaṃ—
an6.66:5.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
